00012 /// Reader for MIDAS .mid files
00013 
00014 class TMidasFile
00015 {
00016 public:
00017   TMidasFile(); ///< default constructor
00018   ~TMidasFile(); ///< destructor
00019 
00020   bool Open(const char* filename); ///< Open input file
00021   bool OutOpen(const char* filename); ///< Open output file
00022 
00023   void Close(); ///< Close input file
00024   void OutClose(); ///< Close output file
00025 
00026   bool Read(TMidasEvent *event); ///< Read one event from the file
00027   bool Write(TMidasEvent *event); ///< Write one event to the output file
00028 
00029   const char* GetFilename()  const { return fFilename.c_str();  } ///< Get the name of this file
00030   int         GetLastErrno() const { return fLastErrno; }         ///< Get error value for the last file error
00031   const char* GetLastError() const { return fLastError.c_str(); } ///< Get error text for the last file error
00032 
00033 protected:
00034 
00035   std::string fFilename; ///< name of the currently open file

00037 
00038   int         fLastErrno; ///< errno from the last operation
00039   std::string fLastError; ///< error string from last errno
00040 
00041   bool fDoByteSwap; ///< "true" if file has to be byteswapped
00042 
00043   int         fFile; ///< open input file descriptor
00044   void*       fGzFile; ///< zlib compressed input file reader
00045   void*       fPoFile; ///< popen() input file reader
00046   int         fOutFile; ///< open output file descriptor
00047   void*       fOutGzFile; ///< zlib compressed output file reader
